title: The Kidney: the living machine
creator_credit: John Rodgers and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Peter Couchman discusses the function of the human kidney with Professor Graeme Campbell of the Melbourne Zoological Department. Discusses kidney malfunction and how this can be treated by dialysis together with footage of patients undergoing treatment at Prince Henry’s Hospital.
creator_credit_for_label: John Rodgers and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
